name: The Intimate Paris Hotel
description:
DESCRIPTION
Are you looking for an intimate wedding venue in the outskirts of Paris? ...then this Mansion can offer you the perfect location for your French wedding. The mansion offers its lounges and garden for your events. Weddings, engagements, afternoon tea, vow renewals they can offer the space for all occasions.
This beautiful address, easily accessible by public transport into the heart of Paris, will allow you to receive guests in a refined setting for a day or half-day.
Located near Paris and La Defense (less than 10 min by train), The Hotel lends its decorations to companies wishing bring together and federate their teams, organize a management committee or a residential seminar, invites partners, present their products at a showroom, etc.
Its guest rooms invite you to disconnect and relax. Ideal for a small wedding party that would like to be close to Paris but have the intimacy of their own home in Ile-de-France. The Hotel can also be privatized with the space of reception room and gardens.
Served by an elevator, the four bedrooms of the Hôtel offer visitors the opportunity to discover "characters" linked to the history of Asnières-sur-Seine. The venue consists of four kingsize bedrooms sleeping 8 guests in total. The Hotel are also able to have interjoining rooms for two of the rooms to create their family suite if you have children within the wedding party. Each room includes ensuite facilities, wifi, minibar and breakfast is included.
A charming 45 m2 living room creates a timeless location for an intimate wedding reception. A cozy atmosphere "like at home". An exceptional touch for professional or private events that will be unique for all your guests. With its stylish decor, traditional mouldings, fireplaces and parquet flooring it instantly creates a peaceful and inviting setting for the most amazing day of your life. It is a bubble of refinement awaiting your presence.
If you are looking for an outdoor reception then there is a 150m2 garden sheltered from anyone looking in. Everything is in place to welcome
about forty people in compliance with standards of sanitary facilities. The hotel will be able to provide you with tables, chairs, gazebo, offset XXL parasols, BBQ (charcoal and gas), plancha and deckchairs. With the help from the staff at the hotel they will be able to help you create your dream Paris wedding. The Hotel are also able to recommend caterers that can cook in the onsite kitchen.
Pricing starts from 120€/h + 60€ for cleaning fee.
If you wish to hire the venue for 1day/night and hire the four bedrooms this will cost - 2500.00€
For more information please do get in touch and we can discuss your requirements.
additional_info:
FEATURES
Internet access
Baby friendly (cots, changing facilities)
Maid service
Hotel recommendation list
Nearest Airport
Recommended caterer
Recommended suppliers list available
Breakfast included
